attributes.action: ask public service employees stop winging about their salaries
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i am tired of hearing how doctors , nurses,the police ,firefighters etc etc are so poor that they cannot afford houses. Well tough i am a welder i served a 5 year apprenticeship and have a wage that is less than most of the above but i manage to maintain a house and family so please tell them to stop their moaning and cut according to their cloth

rejection.details: You need to check the spelling of your petition title so that it makes more sense, thanks
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
